definitions.definition: A flush-decked warship of the 17th-18th centuries having a single tier of guns ; it ranked next below a frigate ; – called in the United States navy a sloop of war .
In a modern navy, a lightly armed and armoured blue water warship, smaller than a frigate , capable of transoceanic duty.

main_definition: ( nautical , historical ) A flush-decked warship of the 17th-18th centuries having a single tier of guns ; it ranked next below a frigate ; – called in the United States navy a sloop of war .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) In a modern navy, a lightly armed and armoured blue water warship, smaller than a frigate , capable of transoceanic duty.
